name: Tapir's Matrix
description:
Programming and GameArt : Marijenburg

Title Screen art  :  Sylvus (https://www.artstation.com/sylvusdraws)

A pick up truck crashed on top of your home few days ago. 

You came up with a system using the rocks that your neighbours llamas spit at you when they see you passing by. You have to dodge the rocks and pick them up when they land in the trees.

Then, you need to drop them on the platform that counter balance with the pick up truck. 

With enough rocks on the platform, you will be able to finally go home.

This game was a little challenge for me for fun.  I wanted to make a short game but didn't have many ideas. So I ask around me for random elements. I asked 6 people.
1 person, gave me 2 game mechanics

- Bullet Time

- Wall Jumping

and each other person gave me these elements

- Forest

- Llama

- Tapir

- Hook

- Couch

With that, I had to find an idea for a game. Here it is!
